cause.description:
The right to choose is about more than a woman's right to safe, legal abortion. Freedom of choice encompasses preventing unintended pregnancy through sex education and improved access to birth control, defending a woman's right to bear healthy children, defending the independence of our nation's courts, and addressing the inequities in reproductive health care.
For more information visit: http://www.plannedparenthood.org/ http://www.saveroe.com/ http://www.teenwire.com/
All are great sources of information and can provide more ways for you to get involved!
1. Unintended pregnancies can be avoided through increased sexual education and access to birth control
2. Pro Choice does not mean Pro Abortion
3. Health Care companies today need to address the growing need for affordable birth control
4. The government needs to protect the rights of women to make their own choices safely
cause.mission: Increase education of the issue and protect our constitutional rights
cause.name: Pro Choice
